#summary IOapps installations
This page describes how to install the whole `IOapps` suite. If you want to install just part of it, please refer to installation instructions for individual tools ([ioreplay#Installation ioreplay], [ioprofiler#Installation ioprofiler]).
= Dependencies =
`IOProfiler` depends on the following application and libraries:
  * python2.6
  * PyQt4
  * matplotlib

`IOreplay` doesn't need any external library or application to run.

= Installation =
Download latest tarball from Downloads sections or grab the source from svn and then:

Run following commands:
{{{
make
}}}
and then
{{{
make install
}}}

This will install the whole `IOapps` suite.
